text: læa pheux brrda phu ru ca trahnak wa thæ cring xalkurxan nan khux sacthrrm cak phracea khxng cea pheux phwk khea ca di sraththa tx man (xalkurxan) læw citcı khxng phwk khea ca di nxbnxm tx man (xalkurxan) læa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng epen phu chinæa brrda phu sraththa su næwthang xan theiyngtrng
